data.message:
PLEASE REPORT THIS TERRORIST PAGE-

http://www.facebook.com/pages/aynas-malk-aly-aljhym/151986531496371 

A page that publishes photos & address of non-muslims people and encourages people to kill them as a punishment,they enter the account as a fridnds and then collect info & photos then threaten...it's a direct call for violence the problem is that there are over 23,000 members in that page so far so reports are not working.FB doesn't give a damn when terrorist are using their site to promote & spread violence & expose innocent people to death & harm because they opened their minds and thoughts.. PLEASE HELP TO REPORT THAT PAGE.it is really dangerous & FB doesn't care.this page contains terrorist content.some people are in severe danger they are tolerant people and trying to resist the authority of islam.
